resources.string: An application update is required to continue using TradeRev.

Would you like to retry? If not, all multimedia will be lost.
VIN must be exactly 17 alphanumeric characters.
Please enter a valid model year.
Please enter a valid mileage count.
Please select the number of passengers.
Please select the exterior color of the vehicle.
Please select the interior color of the vehicle.
Please select the number of cylinders.
Date expected must be at least 7 days from now.
Please capture at least one image.
Auction closing period will be ending soon
Please choose a star rating. 5-star being the most positive experience.
Please complete both the transaction and appraisal ratings.
Please select a Vehicle History report type.
This question has been rejected by the seller.
Are you sure you want to submit this response?
Are you sure you want to reject this question?
Are you sure you want to post this broadcast?
Are you sure you want to ask this question?
Q&A discussions will not appear on the Bill of Sale - see TradeRev\'s Arbitration Policy
This is the maximum you are willing to bid. Your proxy is final and binding and cannot be undone, but you may raise your proxy at any time.
Unable to bid. Auction has ended.
Trade is in CLOSING. Only top two bidders are allowed to bid.
This auction has an active proxy amount. Dealers are unable to bid.
Are you sure you want to place this bid of @1 and proxy of @2?
Someone has already placed a proxy amount of %@.
You have exceeded the maximum number of trades allowed in Arrived, bidding has been disabled.
Please check your payment settings and try again.
Are you sure you want to increase your proxy to @1?
Are you sure you want to include a proxy of @1?
Asking Seller, How much do you need to sell the trade?...
Are you sure you want to reject this Offer?

Are you sure you want to ask for more? (You will be charged a service fee)
How much do you need to make your deal?
Dealer needs more to sell trade
Top Bidder wants to offer more
The Proposed Offer has been Accepted
The Proposed Offer has been Rejected
By rejecting this offer, all negotiations will be halted and you will forfeit your top bid. You must relaunch to sell this trade. Are you sure you want to reject this offer?
If you reject this offer, you will no longer be able to win this auction without going through Closing. Are you sure you want to reject this offer?
Amounts over $3000 must be in increments of $250
Amounts must be in increments of $50
There are no buyers defined in the selected network

WARNING!
By submitting this proposal you understand that:

1. You will lose your ability to Close the Trade (even if there is no response)
2. If your proposal is accepted, the trade will move directly into WON status (without a Closing Period) and a $30.00 fee will appear on your next invoice
3. If you reject any counter offer, the Trade will move directly into LOST status with no chance of a Closing Period.

Are you sure you wish to submit this proposal?
If you reject this proposal you will not be able to start another. Are you sure you want to reject it?
There is a pending negotiation for this auction. You must reject the offer to close this auction.
There is a pending negotiation for this auction. Are you sure you still want to close this auction.
Please select the Network you would like to launch this trade in.
For transactional ratings less than 4 stars, please provide a comment.
For appraisal ratings less than 4 stars, please provide a comment.
By rejecting this offer you will forfeit your top bid and the trade will be marked LOST.
I cannot go any higher than my original top bid.
Click here to enable this feature!
Are you sure you would like to mark this trade lost? You will be charged $250. (If you have not come in possession of this Vehicle, please contact your sale rep)
Are you sure you would like to save and relaunch this trade? You will be charged $250.
Are you sure you wish to save? If it causes a relaunch you will be charged $250.
This trade has been set as an \"AS-IS\" trade as it\'s older than 10 years. This can be turned off in the Vehicle Details Section
This trade has been set as an \"AS-IS\" trade as the vehicle is over 200,000KM/124,000MI. This can be turned off in the Vehicle Details Section
This trade is no longer an \"AS-IS\" trade.
This trade has been updated to not \"AS-IS\" knowing the vehicle is older than 10 years and/or over 200,000KM/124,000MI. This can be turned on in the Vehicle Details Section
This trade has been updated to \"AS-IS\". This can be turned off in the Vehicle Details Section.
I would like to Enable ePayments
Contact TradeRev Support to set up ePayments.
We recently sent you a 1 cent deposit to your bank account. Please click confirm if you have received this deposit to enable ePayments (EFT).
Thanks for signing up for ePayment! We are currently processing your request. Please check back later to confirm your account.
Thank you for confirming our direct deposit.
Are you sure you want to launch this trade now without Damage Photos?
Are you sure you want to park this trade now without Damage Photos?
Are you sure you want to continue editing the trade without including Damage Photos?
Failed to load the Privacy Policy. Please try again later.
Failed to confirm the Privacy Policy acceptance. Please try again later.
Are you sure you want to switch user?
Are you sure you don\'t want to switch user?
The VIN scanned does not match the vehicle you are trying to mark Delivered. Please be sure that you are scanning the correct vehicle.
Vehicle is not outside the selling dealer\'s location and will not be marked Delivered. Please contact TradeRev Support.
It seems that you have switched off the "Location Services" and do not allow apps to get your approximate location. For marking the trade delivered please enable it for the time being.
It seems that you do not let apps to use your wifi or network to get your approximate location. For marking the trade delivered please choose the "High Accuracy" mode for the time being.
It seems that you do not let apps to use your wifi or network to get your approximate location. For marking the trade delivered please switch ON "Google's Location Service" for the time being.
Unable to check if "Location Service" is ON or not. Please check from the "Settings" before proceeding. Go to "Settings" -> "Location" and allow the apps to use "Wi-Fi & Mobile Network Location".
Unable to connect to the internet. Please check your connectivity and try again.
Attempting to mark the vehicle delivered…
Are you sure you want to switch dealer?
Are you sure you don\'t want to switch dealer?
Unable to mark the delivery as disputed. Please try again later.
The buyer has marked this vehicle as delivered. Please confirm or dispute. If no action is taken the vehicle will be marked as Delivered in 24 hours.
Error occurred while trying to confirm the vehicle delivery. Please try again later.
Failed to change the trade state due to authentication failure.
Failed to change the trade state due to internal error. Please try again later.
Failed to change the trade state. Please try again later.
The trade has a pending Inspection and cannot be moved to the new state.
Failed to change the trade state as the selling network does not belong to the dealer.
Cannot move the trade to the new state from this state.
Failed to change the trade state as some required parameters were not passed.
Failed to change the trade state as its not allowed.
Failed to change the trade state as the trade does not exist.

Request to enroll is successfully sent. Please contact your sale representative to check the status of your enrollment.
Request to enroll has failed. Would you like to retry?
Your distance to an ADESA location is not within range. Please contact your sales agent or support@traderev.com to request support for this feature.

By providing your signature to TradeRev on the next screen you agree:

1. To authorize TradeRev to store your electronic signature as part of your user profile and/or your dealership's profile.

2. To authorize TradeRev to apply your electronic signature on file, or the signing authority signature on file for your dealership, to your dealership's Bills of Sale. That, by accepting to use your electronic signature, or your dealership's signing authority signature, on a particular transaction bill of sale, you agree that the electronic signature applied is the legal equivalent of a manual signature. To abide by TradeRev's Terms & Conditions and Arbitration Policy.
Are you sure you would like to mark this trade arrived and sign the Bill of Sale?
Are you sure you would like to mark this trade delivered and sign the Bill of Sale?
Sorry, we were unable to update your signature. Please try again. You can go to Dash -> Profile and add/edit your signature.
Sorry, we were unable to update your signature. Please try again.
Your signature was successfully captured. You may edit your signature from Dash -> Profile.

Unable to bid. You either don\'t have a signature or the company does not have a designated signature attached to the account. Please capture the signature for the authorized person who can sign for a bill of sale on the TradeRev app. This can be done by going into Dash -> Profile on the app.

Error Marking Arrived. You either don\'t have a signature or the dealer does not have a designated signature attached to the account. Please capture the signature for the authorized person who can sign for a bill of sale on the TradeRev app. This can be done by going into Dash -> Profile on the app.

Error Marking Delivered. You either don\'t have a signature or the company does not have a designated signature attached to the account. Please capture the signature for the authorized person, who can sign for a bill of sale on the TradeRev app. This can be done by going into Dash -> Profile on the app
Sorry, we were unable to save the signature. Please draw your signature and try again.
Failed to login because this account has overdue invoices. To reactivate, please log into the web and pay the outstanding invoices.
Failed to login because this account was cancelled upon request. To reactivate, please log into the web and reactivate this account.
You are currently attempting to add a Phone as a Tablet - please use the correct type of device and phone number when adding devices.
You are currently attempting to add a Tablet as a Phone - please use the correct type of device when adding devices.
You must add a device to your account prior to logging in. Please visit your \'My Account\' page to add a device.
